metadata.title: CVE-2018-11813 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
libjpeg 9c has a large loop because read_pixel in rdtarga.c mishandles EOF.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-11813` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjpeg-turbo-progs - 1.5.2-0ubuntu5.18.04.6
libjpeg-turbo-test - 1.5.2-0ubuntu5.18.04.6
libjpeg-turbo8 - 1.5.2-0ubuntu5.18.04.6
libturbojpeg - 1.5.2-0ubuntu5.18.04.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libjpeg6b: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
libjpeg-turbo package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.5.2-0ubuntu5.18.04.6').
libjpeg9: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
